00019    * Constructor.
00020    *
00021    * Note: Default constructor for _indent string creates an empty string.
00022    */

00024     : indent_(),
00025       io_()
00026    {}

00033       io_()

00042    /*
00043    * Return indent string for this object (string of spaces).
00044    */
00045    std::string ParamComponent::indent() const
00046    {  return indent_; }
00047 
00048    /*
00049    * Set indent level to be one higher than that of parent.
00050    */
00051    void ParamComponent::setIndent(const ParamComponent& parent, bool next)
00052    { 
00053       indent_ = parent.indent();
00054       if (next) {
00055          std::string space("  ");
00056          indent_ += space; 
00057       }
00058    }
00059 
00060    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00061    void ParamComponent::setParamCommunicator(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00062    {
00063       // Precondition
00064       if (io_.hasCommunicator()) {
00065          Log::file() << "Resetting param communicator in a ParamComponent"
00066                      << std::endl;
00067          //UTIL_THROW("Attempt to reset param communicator in a ParamComponent");
00068       }
00069       io_.setCommunicator(communicator); 
00070    }
00071    #endif

00073    // Static functions
00074 
00075    /*
00076    * Set echo to true (default) or false.
00077    */
00078    void ParamComponent::setEcho(bool echo)
00079    {  echo_ = echo; }
00080 
00081    /*
00082    * Get value of echo. true = echoing is on, false = off.
00083    */
00084    bool ParamComponent::echo()
00085    {  return echo_; }
00086 
00087    /*
00088    * This static method exists to guarantee initialization of a static 
00089    * constant echo_ that is defined in the same file.  Call it somewhere 
00090    * in the program to guarantee that the contents of this file will 
00091    * be linked, rather than optimized away. It may only be called once.
00092    */
00093    void ParamComponent::initStatic()
00094    {  
00095       // This function can only be called once.
00096       static int nCall = 0;
00097       if (nCall == 0) {
00098          echo_ = false; 
00099       }
00100       ++nCall;
00101    }
00102 
00103 } 
00104 #endif
